part.title: Main
part.step: Whisk eggs in a large bowl, add flour, stock and salt and pepper and whisk to combine.
Heat oil in large pan and place about 1/2 cup of mixture making it as round as possible.
You can place an amount of bacon and/or shrimp on pancake before flipping.
Once edges start to cook flip over and cook other side.
Flip over a couple of time to ensure middle cooked and both sides are golden.
Remove from pan and garnish with sauces and spring onions and/or bacon if desired.

part.title: Optional
part.step: Add these as sides or you can mix in with the eggs.

part.title: Toppings
part.step: Squeeze sauces all over top and sprinkle Shallots and Spring Onions on top.
